title: Am I lucky or was it guaranteed? (pokemon)
body:
hit Solgaleo a couple times, got a crit, brought him to 1 hp, caught him with 1 dusk ball..?

was it a fluke or is he supposed to be ridiculously easy to catch?

will he not faint? is he supposed to have a 100% catch rate?

i am confused... a fking beldum was harder to catch than this guy....
